mapper.insert: insert into notice(title, content, writer, regdate) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, now())
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, regdate, hit from notice order by bno desc
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, hit from notice where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update notice set hit = hit + 1 where bno = #{bno}
update notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, regdate=now() where bno = #{bno}
